Description of incident: An oversight by the city of Madison's            personnel office is the reason Social Security numbers of city employees            were stored on a laptop computer stolen from a city office. Any official            or employee  -  except those in the police, fire and transit departments             -  who was issued a new or replacement city identification card            from the start of 2004 through 2007 may be at risk. Data on the laptop            included photos, names and Social Security numbers.
